SELECT mcSeq, mcTypeCd, mcRegionCd, mcName, mcAddress, mcTel, mcServiceMemo, partnerName, dateOfPartnership, mcBasicPrice, mcBasicWorker, mcBasicDistance, mcMainVehicle, addPriceWorker, addPriceDistance, ladderTruckNy, mcDelNy

SELECT a.mcSeq, a.mcTypeCd, a.mcRegionCd, a.mcName, a.mcAddress, a.mcTel, a.mcServiceMemo, a.partnerName, a.dateOfPartnership, a.mcBasicPrice, a.mcBasicWorker, a.mcBasicDistance, a.mcMainVehicle, a.addPriceWorker, a.addPriceDistance, a.ladderTruckNy, a.mcDelNy FROM movingcompany AS a WHERE 1=1 AND mcSeq=#{mcSeq}
